mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_INACCTDEL (INACCTDELSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, DELRECCODE, DELSGMTCODE, DELSTARTDATE, DELENDDATE,REPORTFLAG,ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS,ORG_CODE ) values (#{InAcctDelSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DelRecCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DelSgmtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DelStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DelEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Etl_Date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{SourceSys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_INACCTDEL set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELRECCODE = #{DelRecCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELSGMTCODE = #{DelSgmtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELSTARTDATE = #{DelStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELENDDATE = #{DelEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INACCTDELSEQNO = #{InAcctDelSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select INACCTDELSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, DELRECCODE, DELSGMTCODE, DELSTARTDATE, DELENDDATE from PBCRS_REPORT_INACCTDEL where INACCTDELSEQNO = #{InAcctDelSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
